title: Gamification Education for Smart City Communities

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Strengthens creative problem-solving competencies for medical/legal/technical professionals addressing smart city challenges.

learning_goals: Learners can apply smart city core technologies (IoT, big data, AI) to gamification activities.
Learners can design community problem-solving scenarios using the Design Thinking process.
Learners can prototype community-tailored smart solutions through collaboration-based digital platforms.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
